cleaned_text: Holistic Health Center is an integrative wellness center offering chiropractic care, functional medicine, massage therapy, acupuncture, dry needling, cupping and functional nutrition. Our mission is to treat every patient as a whole person, and work collaboratively with you to find effective natural, holistic solutions for all your health concerns. Our primary goal is to establish a therapeutic partnership between the patient and the practitioner and to shift from the traditional symptom focused care to a functional approach that looks closely at the interactions between environmental, genetics, and lifestyle factors that often influence long-term the health of every individual. Our vision is to be wellness advocates for our community and to empower every individual to achieve the highest expression of health and vitality. Schedule an [APPOINTMENT](appointment) or call [(810) 337-9594](tel:810-337-9594) today! If you have any questions, call or email us and our staff will respond as soon as possible! Our patient forms are available online and can be completed before you come to your appointment. Schedule a convenient appointment with our office now. We can't wait to meet you! Learn about all of the services that we provide to patients at our optometry clinic. Dr. Kahin is a native of Toronto, Canada. She completed her undergraduate studies at McMaster University in Hamilton, Canada. And her Doctor of Chiropractic (D.C.) from Life Chiropractic College in Marietta, Georgia. Dr. Kahin is a board certified doctor of chiropractic and certified holistic medicine practitioner. She is also certified in IASTM, Cupping, Dry Needling, Functional Movement Therapy and NeuroKinetic Therapy. She also holds chiropractic licenses in Georgia and California. She has been serving the Genesee County area since 2006. As a wellness practitioner with extensive experience in treating a vast array of health conditions, Dr. Kahin is dedicated to helping her patients achieve healthier lifestyle and optimal wellness through holistic functional medicine.
